title: Cannondale Dave Dirt Jump Bike is begging for pump track laps and street jibs
content:
Cannondale have taken a huck into the DJ World with the all-new Dave. This beefy aluminium frame with 26″ wheels is principally designed as a dirt jump bike, but should  serve you equally well at the local pump track, skate park, and on whatever bonus features you find down the street. Here’s everything you need […]

The post Cannondale Dave Dirt Jump Bike is begging for pump track laps and street jibs appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
